_instructions: This file defines all MCP servers. API keys are automatically populated from .env file during installation.

tavily-remote-mcp._description: Tavily MCP - Web search and research. Required for 'search' skill.

context7._description: Context7 MCP - Developer documentation search. Required for 'search' skill.

grep._description: Grep MCP - Search across a million public GitHub repositories. Required for 'search' skill.

openalex-research._description: OpenAlex MCP - Academic paper discovery and citation analysis. Required for 'research' skill.

pdf-reader._description: PDF Reader MCP - PDF text extraction. Required for 'research' skill.

paper-search._description: Paper-search MCP - Multi-platform academic paper search and download. Optional for 'research' skill.
paper-search._note: Includes Google Scholar + Sci-Hub integration. Check Terms of Service and legal considerations.

zai-zread._description: Z.AI Zread MCP - GitHub repo semantic search (issues, PRs, docs). Optional for 'search' and 'research' skills.
zai-zread._quota: 1,000 calls/month shared pool (Pro plan). Only search_doc is unique.

_enabledTools.search_doc: Semantic search across repo issues, PRs, docs - UNIQUE capability

_disabledTools._comment: Disable in agent config to save quota - use free alternatives

zai-vision._description: Z.AI Vision MCP - Image/video analysis, UI code gen, diagram understanding. Optional for 'ui-animation', 'code-review', 'docs-write' skills.
zai-vision._quota: Uses 5-hour prompt pool (not MCP call quota). Requires GLM Coding Plan.

_enabledTools.ui_to_artifact: Generate code from UI screenshots - UNIQUE capability
_enabledTools.ui_diff_check: Compare two UI screenshots - UNIQUE multi-image

_disabledTools._comment: Disable in agent config - overlap with look_at tool
_disabledTools.extract_text_from_screenshot: Use look_at tool instead (can do OCR)

graphite._description: Graphite MCP - Stacked PR management. Required for 'graphite' skill.
graphite._prerequisite: Graphite CLI v1.6.7+ must be installed (npm install -g @withgraphite/graphite-cli)
